law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 67, effective July 13, 1990; amended ch. 325, sec. 24. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 366, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 95, effective January 1, 1979; ch. 260, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978; and ch. 391, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 9. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(3); and ch. 261, sec. 1. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 1. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 1(2) to (10).

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Finance and Administration Cabinet -- Powers and duties.
metadata.lrc-note: (7-13-90). This section was amended by the 1990 Regular Session of the General Assembly and also repealed. Pursuant to KRS 446.260, the repeal prevails.
